</ol><p>Arduino Uno : Stepper and servo motors are controlled using  arduino</p><p>It also links the hardware and software part of the project</p><p>Moving arm mechanism:Arms in the shape of c made of wood are controlled with the help of stepper motors and its back and forth movements are controlled using servo motors.</p><p><img data-sz="f" name="Cbj4eEjlm_kj3M:" class="rg_i" alt="Image result for arduino uno" jsaction="load:str.tbn" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="width: 254px; height: 178px; margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px;"><br></p><p>Problems Faced:</p><p>Since all the c arms used were handmade they were not exactly alike.</p><p>The servo motors were not much efficient to provide the necessary torque to the respected stepper motors due to its weight, so we are still facing the problem</p><p>It was a big problem to select the most efficient algorithm to solve the cube which would take minimum time to complete the cube, so we used Kociemba's algorithm to figure this out.</p>
